netP5
Class NetAddress

java.lang.Object
  netP5.NetAddress

public class NetAddress
extends java.lang.Object

NetAddress is an Object that contains an inetaddress of an remote internet address, consisting of an ip address and a port number.

Author:
andreas schlegel
